revision.text:
__NOTOC__{{codepointer|Weapon}}void '''A_OverlayTranslation''' (int ''layer'', name ''trname'')
==Usage== Sets the [[translation]] of the specified [[A_Overlay|overlay]] by name.
===Parameters=== *''layer'': the layer whose translation to set. *''trname'': the name of the translation to set, as defined in [[TRNSLATE]].
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
